title: Tapatio Hot Sauce Font
content:
I'm trying to find the font used for the word "Tapatio" on this hot sauce label. Specifically looking at the A character. Any help is very very much appreciated.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tapatio_Logo_SM_5609.jpg)
author: robrunrap

comments.content:
Tapatio looks like the same font as Slasa Picante -- note for example the open bowl P -- but with the A modified to echo the stroke on the P.  
There are fonts with the open P, mini-serifs and other features in your image. Including Pompei [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/pompei/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/pompei/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/pompei/")  
and Pona [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografies/pona-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografies/pona-display/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografies/pona-display/")  
Don
Thanks Don! Those both look like nice options.
